title: Very Tough t207 Donnelly (Anon) for Sale -- lowered to $160!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Very Tough t207 Donnelly (Anon) for Sale -- lowered to $160!!
posts.post_content:
Very difficult card from the t207 Broadleaf/Anon/Cycle class.  This particular player makes many collector's "top 10" lists in terms of most difficult t207s to try to find.

Donnelly looks very nice on the front with only a couple thin wrinkles.  The back has some scraping and a few areas where someone tried to handwrite the words in with a black pen.  

Asking $160 delivered....thanks in advance,
Brian

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=95412&d=1365638738[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=95413&d=1365638752[/IMG]

Donnelly still available and price lowered to $195.  Affordable way to knock a tough, tough player off your checklist!

Thanks much!
Brian

Nice tough card, Brian!

Donnelly's still my avatar for good reason.  He was my last T207, and time was I'd have coughed up more than that, just to knock him off the list.  

--
Mike
Thanks Mike, I appreciate the kind words!  :)

Final bump on Donnelly....down to $160, which is a very cheap price to pick up such a tough player in the set.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
Donnelly with the Anon back still available at $160. Surprised he hasn't moved yet as this is a really tough player to find. Get him while he's cheap!
